Filters in tubular

  • errormessage - Use `errormessage` to retrieve the friendly message possible in a HTTP Error object.
  • numberorcurrency - `numberorcurrency` is a hack to hold `currency` and `number` in a single filter.
  • characters - `characters` filter truncates a sentence to a number of characters. Based on https://github.com/sparkalow/angular-truncate/blob/master/src/truncate.js
